moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target burned.

moves.name: X Sp. Atk
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Sp. Atk by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Race You!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks. Raises the user’s critical-hit rate by 1 stat rank.

moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target burned.

passives.name: Wide Awake
passives.description: Prevents the user from falling asleep.

passives.name: Power Reserves 2
passives.description: Powers up the user’s moves when in a pinch.

passives.name: Superduper Effective 1
passives.description: Powers up moves that are super effective.
